div.p: A code from the SNOMED Clinical Terminology UK with the expression (<<71388002 |Procedure|<<129125009 |Procedure with explicit context|).

ul.li: Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where constraint = (<<71388002 |Procedure|<<129125009 OR |Procedure with explicit context|)
